main event: Two objects with brilliant red light were spotted in the sky over Belvidere, South Dakota, on December 2, 1956.
interesting points: The objects had a circumference of 2 feet,The smaller object appeared to be trailing the larger one,The bright light from the objects startled the observer,The objects disappeared as if the light was turned off,The sighting lasted possibly ten minutes.
sighted object: two brilliant red objects in the sky
